devdoc.author: Compound (modified by Dharma Labs, Arr00 and Venus)

params.accessControlManager_: The address of the AccessControlManager contract
params.baseRatePerYear_: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by EXP_SCALE)
params.blocksPerYear_: The number of blocks per year
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear_: The multiplier after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied
params.multiplierPerYear_: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by EXP_SCALE)
params.timeBased_: A boolean indicating whether the contract is based on time or block.

getBlockNumberOrTimestamp().details: Function to simply retrieve block number or block timestamp

returns._0: Current block number or block timestamp

params.badDebt: The amount of badDebt in the market
params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

returns._0: The borrow rate percentage per slot (block or second) as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.badDebt: The amount of badDebt in the market
params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserveFactorMantissa: The current reserve factor for the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

returns._0: The supply rate percentage per slot (block or second) as a mantissa (scaled by EXP_SCALE)

updateJumpRateModel(uint256,uint256,uint.custom:error: Unauthorized if the sender is not allowed to call this function

params.baseRatePerYear: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by EXP_SCALE)
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear: The multiplierPerBlockOrTimestamp after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied
params.multiplierPerYear: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by EXP_SCALE)

params.badDebt: The amount of badDebt in the market
params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused)

returns._0: The utilization rate as a mantissa between [0, MANTISSA_ONE]

devdoc.title: JumpRateModelV2

InvalidBlocksPerYear().notice: Thrown when blocks per year is invalid

InvalidTimeBasedConfiguration().notice: Thrown when time based but blocks per year is provided

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

accessControlManager().notice: The address of the AccessControlManager contract

baseRatePerBlock().notice: The base interest rate per block or second which is the y-intercept when utilization rate is 0

blocksOrSecondsPerYear().notice: Stores blocksPerYear if isTimeBased is true else secondsPerYear is stored

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current borrow rate per slot (block or second)

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply rate per slot (block or second)

isInterestRateModel().notice: Indicator that this is an InterestRateModel contract (for inspection)

isTimeBased().notice: Acknowledges if a contract is time based or not

jumpMultiplierPerBlock().notice: The multiplier per block or second after hitting a specified utilization point

kink().notice: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied

multiplierPerBlock().notice: The multiplier of utilization rate per block or second that gives the slope of the interest rate

updateJumpRateModel(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Update the parameters of the interest rate model

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `(borrows + badDebt) / (cash + borrows + badDebt - reserves)`

userdoc.notice: An interest rate model with a steep increase after a certain utilization threshold called **kink** is reached. The parameters of this interest rate model can be adjusted by the owner. Version 2 modifies Version 1 by enabling updateable parameters
